scripts.dev:vite: nodemon --exec "pnpm --filter misakura build && pnpm serve dev" --ext ts --watch packages/misakura/src/ --ignore packages/view/
scripts.dev:only: pnpm --filter misakura build && pnpm serve exec tauri dev
scripts.build:all: pnpm --filter misakura build && pnpm --filter avgjs build
scripts.dev:demo: nodemon --exec "pnpm --filter misakura build && pnpm --filter @misakura/demo dev" --ext ts --watch packages/misakura/src/ --ignore packages/demo/
